org.threadly.litesockets

Interface Client.Closer

  • Enclosing class:
    Client

    public static interface Client.Closer
    This is the Closer Interface for clients. This works almost exactly like Reader. It is also single threaded on the same thread key as the reads. No action must be taken when this is called but it is usually advised to do some kind of clean up or something as this client object will no longer ever be used.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClose(Client client)
      This notifies the callback about the client being closed.

    • Method Detail

      • onClose

        void onClose(Client client)
        This notifies the callback about the client being closed.
        Parameters:
        client - This is the client the close is being called for.
